tns:patch.author: Octavian Ciubotaru
tns:patch.description: recreate view, this will always be the last version of the view

script.lang: SELECT settingsvalue FROM amp_global_settings where settingsname='Recreate the views on the next server restart';

DROP VIEW IF EXISTS v_ni_indicator_funding CASCADE;
create view v_ni_indicator_funding AS select ic.activity_id as amp_activity_id, iv.value, iv.value_type, a.actual_start_date as value_date, ic.indicator_id as me_indicator_id, null::varchar as me_tag from amp_indicator i join amp_indicator_connection ic ON i.indicator_id = ic.indicator_id and ic.sub_clazz='a' join amp_indicator_values iv ON ic.id = iv.ind_connect_id join amp_activity_version a ON ic.activity_id = a.amp_activity_id where not iv.history union select ic.activity_id as amp_activity_id, itv.value, iv.value_type, a.actual_start_date as value_date, ic.indicator_id as me_indicator_id, itv.tag as me_tag from amp_indicator i join amp_indicator_connection ic ON i.indicator_id = ic.indicator_id and ic.sub_clazz='a' join amp_indicator_values iv ON ic.id = iv.ind_connect_id join amp_indicator_tagged_values itv on iv.ind_val_id = itv.ind_val_id join amp_activity_version a ON ic.activity_id = a.amp_activity_id where not iv.history;
